ComicInfo.Title: One Summer's Day in the Suburbs; Aquatic Leap; Cashing in on the Man of Steel; 13 Ways to Know You've Had Enough of Winter; After-School Job Opportunities; Cracked Animal Species That Didn't Quite Make It (...and Why.); Jobs Video Games will Prepare You for; This Valentine's Day Cracked Says It with Flowers; Castle Dracula; Kenny the Cockroach's Toy Tenement Sale!; The Cracked Family Reunion Dinner Games; Test Your First Aid Knowledge!; Cats Are People Too!; Homeboy Alone, Too: Loot in New York; Swimsuit Beauties Around the World
